channel.title: tutorial on Atharva Shah
channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on Atharva Shah

item.title: Sales Data Analysis with Python
item.description: Through a combination of theoretical explanations and practical demonstrations, we will delve into data preprocessing, exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, and model building.

item.title: Setting Up CI/CD to Netlify for Static Sites via Github
item.description: A step-by-step beginner friendly guide to setting up CI/CD to Netlify for static sites like Hugo, Jekyll, etc. Code snippets for Github actions included.

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 3
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 2
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: Django Crypto App Part 1
item.description: Here, we will be defining the functional requirements and give you the overview of what we are building, the approach, the high-level design and the project setup using Django.

item.title: UML Diagrams with ChatGPT: Step-by-Step Tutorial
item.description: 5 Step process to use ChatGPT to generate UML diagrams for your projects in just a few clicks. Easy to follow instructions with visual illustrations.
